website_summaries.verdict: A traditional wavy water bed that performs well and doesn't break the budget.
pros: King-sized version holds 230 gallons of water
Heater can warm this bed quickly
Lots of wave action for a good night's sleep
cons: The plug can be difficult to undo
Vinyl odor can be strong when new

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping well
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about this mattress because it was fairly inexpensive. I will say it has exceeded my expectations. I read reviews about the rings on the pull cap breaking. I was cautious and mine did not break. I will say the plug was difficult to get to pop out. The mattress is deep and has nice thick corners. It's very comfortable and wavy which helps eliminate pressure points. The vinal smell is pretty strong though and I hope it goes away in time.. soon I hope it fade soon it is really strong. It was really easy to fold out and fill. Overall it is a good mattress and I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terriermom

customer_reviews.title: Beware any Innomax branded product online. If you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware any Innomax branded product online. If you have a warranty problem you will have to pay shipping costs BOTH to send the unit to Innomax, AND to have a repaired/replacement unit returned to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really think about it
customer_reviews.text: Loved until first leak 2 days in... Warranty is bs basically does not cover anything. So don't even think about that. Make sure you have plenty of liquid vinyl seal cause it never ends when you get a hole. Prepare for patch heaven. An I can't even drain the darn thing. Wish was more durable. Got this for my kids and for me since water noise helPs me sleep. An the kids sleep better and less pressure on me when the kids sleep on me... Love it but at the same time hate it
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Not the most “heavy duty” mattress I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is considerably thinner than my previous one. Got it all installed and bam, cat put a tiny hole in it. Patched it, sleeping in my recliner for the night. That was about a month ago. Woke up this morning to a wet bed again, this time because the patch did not seal flat enough and little creases let water seep the whole night. I now have glue on the tiny tiny hole and will try to patch my brand new mattress again. Just wish it was made of a thicker material. Never had a problem with my cat with the previous mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Barb V

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for our 10 year old waterbed. We've used this type for 30+ years. There is quite a vinyl odor, but if you leave the blankets off for a day or so, it goes away. I would like the spout to be on one side or the other rather than in the middle. And it is harder to see to get the air out. But those are two small problems for the comfort of a waterbed. And the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: stronnes

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: bought one dec 2018 as well as a new liner. it leaked by jan 2019. glad for the new liner. they replaced it with another. that one lasted until april 2020. again glad for the liner. warranty requires that i pay to return it and they will decide if it can be repaired or replaced. since this was the 2nd of the same type and shipping of the weight will be expensive, decided to buy a new one of a diff brand. we have had 2 before these. one lasted 30 years, another lasted 25 years. this was waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: curlyaaron

customer_reviews.title: CAVEAT EMPTOR! KNOW YOUR NEEDS!
customer_reviews.text: I CAN ONLY ANTICIPATE THE DAY I'LL NEED TO RETRIEVE IT FOR THE REPLACEMENT! UNSURE w/HUGE SELECTION I GOT 2! THIS "FREE FLOW" IS SEMI-WAVELESS AS WELL! HAVING PURCHASED SEVERAL WATERBED MATTRESSES THRU THE YEARS.. I ONLY REMEMBER CHOICES BEING: "SINGLE.. DBL.. QUEEN OR KING!" MY MAIN FOCUS WAS THE QUALITY & THICKNESS OF THE VINLY PLY! IT'S ACTUALLY VERY GOOD... HOPEFULLY, IT LASTS A LONG TIME IN IT'S BOX UP IN MY S FLA ATTIC UNTIL I NEED IT! SEEMS NOT ALL "PRIME PURCHASES" ARE HONORED AS STATED "FREE SHIP, FREE RETURN"... I'M DONE!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA MARIE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but it has issues.
customer_reviews.text: The material is too dark, can't see the air bubbles inside. Very difficult to purge the air. I think it's to big. Had to fill up to the top of my frame to get it firm. Makes it difficult to get my sheets on! If it was smaller it would get firmer sooner w/o have to fill it so much. As soon as I find something better I'm going to replace this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Needed patched out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We bought this matress in February to replace our old mattress. We took it out of the box and filled it up last night and there are at least 6 pin sized holes. We are hoping that's all there are. We are not confident it will last. Reduced the rating to 1 star. Patches will not hold. Have not had one leak free night since we set it up. Looking for better replacement. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Pewwwww !
customer_reviews.text: We've had this set up for 2 weeks and the smell is unbearable !!! We have the window open, fan going, and door closed and we can still smell it when we walk in the front door. NOT HAPPY !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathe

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Old-style feeling. Very wavy. I like this much better than the waveless mattress I had to replace because my back ached every night
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waterbed mattress for my water bed and it fits my waterbed perfectly it was easy to install and put water in the mattress I'd highly definitely recommend buying this mattress
customer_reviews.author: rebagreen

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Now I just have to wait ( 24hrs ) for it to "acclimatize" and I'll be back sleeping on a cloud ! My last mattress sprung a leak at one of. the seams ...
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress. I have been using it since I received it. It is less expensive than those regular mattress that people have to buy ever few years. I have three waterbeds which I have had since 1968!!!
customer_reviews.author: Labor Law

customer_reviews.title: Powerful chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: This mattress had a horrible chemical odor. We aired it out for a month but the odor remained so potent you could barely stay in the same room without feeling sick. We next ordered the California King Free Flow mattress which is very comfortable, but had a potent vinyl odor which kept us from sleeping on it for over a month while we aired it out. It still emits a mild vinyl odor. This is the third (not including the Calf mattress) water mattress we've ordered over the years. We were able to sleep on the first two right away. Neither one had any type of discernable odor.
customer_reviews.author: bdoc

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality perfect fit. The seams appear to be well re-enforced and the thickness is just fine. I would say, it does what it is supposed to do and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BigBobbyD

customer_reviews.title: Strong, overpowering odor
customer_reviews.text: We have slept on a waterbed since they were introduced. We have replaced them three times. We never had a problem with one until this time. The vinyl odor is so strong that it felt almost toxic. My husband and I both started having high blood pressure problems. I have washed the bed linens and aired out the room for two days, but the strong odor still remains. We are going to get rid of this mattress and try to find another one to replace it. I would like to know where it was made and what kind of vinyl material was used. Is that information available?
customer_reviews.author: M Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The material seems too thin compared to my old matress
customer_reviews.text: I needed a six inch matresss and bought this 8 inch mattress. I need to replace it with the right size. It would be ok for a water bed that uses an 8 inch mattress.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: INNOMAX SANCTUARY FREE FLOW FULL WAVE WATERBED MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: MATTRESS WORKS GREAT SOOO COMFY. iTS THE ONLY TYPE OF BED I CAN SLEEP ON.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: We waited for the "warm-up" period and filled the waterbed from the faucet. It fit perfectly and was warm enough to sleep on that night. Good quality at a good price. Arrived in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keene

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: The bladder is great, sadly the outer cap broke when we removed it :-( Had to wait for a replacement before we could fill.
customer_reviews.author: Kssnflower

customer_reviews.title: pain gone!
customer_reviews.text: Best water bed I've ever had. The bursa pain on my hips went completely away. Old waterbed mattress caused pain from material being too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: BOB. I've just received 2 more chargers. we call them the "hot" chargers. they charge things really fast.  They are made for the Raspberry pi and we have 2 running on them. Working great.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for the last 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for the last 6 weeks. Appears to be sturdy enough. Only difference I see between this and my previous bladder is that the fill neck is centered at the foot rather than at one corner.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Grest job
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this mattress is that it allows the bed to heat up quickly. That is a super plus for me. I received it right on time. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: N Turner

customer_reviews.title: I can't find a better mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a mattress like this for 25 years. I just can not find a mattress as comfortable anywhere for me and my physical condition. Plus I can keep it warm in the winter and a bit cooler in the summer. I love that I can replace it so inexpensively! Yay to them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a great quality waterbed mattress and exactly what was advertised. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. AdamsTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent waterbed mattress. No issues at all. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job 100% and with our order they sent a spare backup mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tough Customerson

customer_reviews.title: seems fine
customer_reviews.text: easy to install ........ comfortable .......... looks durable, but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is great smell is not
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but I can’t get over the smell. It’s been months and it’s still horrible
customer_reviews.author: TLJx2

customer_reviews.title: INNOMAX free flow mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress works great. Very comfortable. The only problem that I had was with the fill cap. The pull tabs broke off while trying to pull the fill spout out. I just replaced it with the one from my old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: If you’re one of the few who still sleeps on a water bed this mattress is perfect, easy to install so far no problems
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Just one issue, a miner one.
customer_reviews.text: Checks all the boxes, save one. My only issue is that it is red and you can't see through it to make sure there sent to many bubbles other than that lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... had hole in it when I received it too bad I had to send it back didn't get to ...
customer_reviews.text: waterbed had hole in it when I received it too bad I had to send it back didn't get to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: SamAndBella

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Saved our hash. Prime shipping got it here in under 48 hours, which meant only 2 nights on an air mattress. Nobody local carries these anymore. Thanks Amazon and ImmoMax. Bed is surprisingly good quality and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Arrr me Hearties!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1st time in 30 yrs. we needed a new mattress
customer_reviews.author: cyclegranny0307

customer_reviews.title: had better ones. also got a hole in corner 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: feels very thin......been a water bed owner for 37 yrs. its scares me when the kids come jump in. def..had better ones. also got a hole in corner 1st week. but I'm not draining it and sending it bk. what a mess that would be.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Wicker

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: It is the same thickness and strength as much more expensive mattresses. It was easy to install. I had no issue with the opening being in the middle of the mattress instead of the side. No longlasting vinyl odor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Grant

customer_reviews.title: it was a good price, it came fast
customer_reviews.text: we needed 2nd bed at our 2nd house, and we are old hippies and love are water beds. we get the best sleep ever on this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K.

customer_reviews.title: Innomax Sanctuary free flow king size waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly, easy to set up and so far working great
customer_reviews.author: viperess

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Full Wave Waterbed
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, set it right up following directions and put the fluid in it before I sealed it up. It appears well made, heavy duty, should last another 10 years (like last one).
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Leaks aftrr a few years
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years the reinforced corner sprung a leak. Not a good product!
customer_reviews.author: a fan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, and comfortable too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the waterbed mattress. Great quality, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dooey

customer_reviews.title: found a hole in the matress when we filled it up the first time
customer_reviews.text: there was a hole in the mattress when we filled it up and the patch material provided was wothless
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: the odor was strong for weeks.... ...
customer_reviews.text: the odor was strong for weeks......we kept the door closed and windows opened for 3.5 weeks before the room was useable. It's ok now, arrived fast and fit perfectly in the california king frame
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Owned for a few years, Still working great.
customer_reviews.text: My parents' old waterbed had finally had it and so I helped them buy this along with the theand they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Nova7o9

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, i had a memory foam mattress before this and i will never go back, i personaly love the waves when you lay into the bed, helps me relax more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress. Easy to layout and fill without having to straighten out after a little water in it. Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with this mattress. I accidently majorly overfilled it and it didn't leak or break. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzie

customer_reviews.title: Love our waterbed!
customer_reviews.text: We have had our waterbed for 35 years and have always had a full wave mattress. This is the first time we've purchased this brand. It is very comfortable. The squared corners help to keep the sheets from slipping off the corners. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress, sleeping great now and back stopped hurting. Just like in the 70s, plenty of wave action. Seems very heavy duty, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard2468

customer_reviews.title: Leaky waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this new mattress for about a month now, and it already has developed a hole causing a leak. Not impressed with the quality at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: did not like
customer_reviews.text: the mattress is taller than standard and cant get enough water in it without going above the liner
customer_reviews.author: Al  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the new mattress. Will make sure I order all my waterbed supplies from this place.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wed really like this matress. IT fit thew frame and filled without wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: Don J

customer_reviews.title: Good bladder
customer_reviews.text: I've replace my old, leaky mattress with the InnoMax and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough stars our mattress was leaking and we got our new one next day it was 2 days early super service
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A.

customer_reviews.title: We love our waterbed
customer_reviews.text: We love our waterbed, have slept on one for years, got a leak, ordered this one, got it within 4 days, put it in, filled it up, AHHHHH great night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very thin vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Got a pin hole 2 weeks after purchase. Put patch on and has held up so far. Wish it was thicker vinyl. The 10 year old mattress it replaced was much heavier material
customer_reviews.author: Cairl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Seems heavy enough to last. I like the free flow. the baffled ones are ok too.
customer_reviews.author: Brent J

customer_reviews.title: InnoMax Sanctuary Free Flow Full Wave Waterbed Mattress, King
customer_reviews.text: Most of my reviews are 5 stars but as stated by other buyers, this is not the same mattress as shown in the ad. I got one of the same (dark red/ maroon) mattresses a couple years ago and was rudely awakened when the plastic filler (where the cap is) separated from the vinyl about 3 weeks ago and is not repairable. I bought this one because it was blue in the picture and I DID NOT want the maroon one again that had failed before. I got a maroon one just like the defective one. Sleeping with one eye open and a life preserver standing by.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Our backs love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our waterbed mattress! Our backs are so thankful for it. The quality seems great! Glad to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Shipment never arrived
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is my old one was awesome... Very comfortable. if my new ever arrives I'll let you know how it feels...
customer_reviews.author: Natureguy

customer_reviews.title: hung in the shed 1st
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, Reviewers warned about the strong plasitc-chemical odor and were correct. So I hung it in my shed for a couple of weeks then installed it. All is well.
customer_reviews.author: Texan Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: Have had waterbeds for 30 years. Works well and was $20 cheaper that local store.
customer_reviews.author: SSLE

customer_reviews.title: it took 3 weeks but fine now. very comfortable i like the extra
customer_reviews.text: my 1st review was that it smelled. it took 3 weeks but fine now. very comfortable i like the extra height
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: A truly excellent mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We have been sleeping on waterbed mattresses for forty years. This is the best at the lowest price in that entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal! But, better made cap strongly advised for manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is fine, my complaint is the flimsiness, cheapness, of the screw-on cap that's ONLY job is to keep the water in! When you reach in to pull out the cap from it's recess by the plastic loops provided to add water or just to burp the bed, unless you are VERY careful, the cap slips off and unless you act very quick you've got water spewing out everywhere! The cap couldn't be made any thinner and it's an accident waiting to happen every time you need to access it. All of my previous mattresses had a thick sturdy cap that never was a threat of slipping its threads when being pulled out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick N.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: works with old heater, nice and strong. durable and thick. i would recomend to anyonne looking for a cheaper and nice water bed.
customer_reviews.author: young feather

customer_reviews.title: Thick sturdy, easy to work with and doesn't stink.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Nice quality. No issues with the new mattress smell. This thing is tough, very thick.
customer_reviews.author: T J.

customer_reviews.title: I need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bladder in April of this year and it is now October the bladder is leaking around the seams where you fill it with water. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: PRO: So far it has exceeded expectations. I have only had it installed and filled a couple of weeks, but I already like it better than the one that it replaced. It seems like a thicker vinyl which means the sloshing noise is reduced. I like the center fill location as that seems to make it easier to expel air. CON: The pull tabs on the fill cap broke the first time I attempted to use them. They just pulled off. It seemed like a good idea, but they are not strong enough obviously. The real test will be the durability. I had the old mattress for 33 years before it sprung a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it for sensory integration tasks and it works great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality! Easy to set up. Will be buying an extra one soon...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has been great for over 6 months now. Nice smooth strong material.

customer_reviews.title: Buy different mattress
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to get the firmness needed. Fill mattress level to support and liner,still was able to touch bottom of the frame with my hand. Don't recommend you buy this bladder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has been 20 years since my last waterbed and finally sleeping well again

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress for a while and could not be happier. Would buy again if I ever wear this one out as well.

customer_reviews.title: Waterbed matteress or Real bed... Keeping the Waterbed!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery to order this product but I am thrilled to say we are OVERLY satisfied. It arrived in a smaller box than expected but the quality is everything we expected. We have had a water bed for over 35 years and tossed around getting a regular bed, when I searched on line and found that I could replace my mattress for such a reasonable price I went with what we LOVE... The quality is good and the service/delivery as stated when ordered. I read other reviews and that helped me make our decision so I hope this one helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: product failed when purchased originally. replacement failed in less ...
customer_reviews.text: product failed when purchased originally. replacement failed in less than one year. Purchased 12/27/15 is there some kind of guarantee?

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Like what I got for the price! Would buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but after a while it started turning my sheets red.

customer_reviews.text: Went back to a full wave from a full waveless and I'm much happier. Excellent quality

customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good allround deal
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, delivered earlier than expected ,well packed in a box. A nice thick rubber mattress with the filler cap in the middle of the bed , which is much better than the conventional cap to one side.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely shaped mattress. I don't have any problem with sheets coming off, Really love it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you like the old-school waterbed, like I do, you know there are no longer waterbed stores in every town. After something like 30 years, our mattress had a leak, and we found this supplier on line. We got it in a few days and are happy as clams!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It met all of my expectation. I am very please

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of time with this yet but fit was perfect, setup was a breeze thanks mostly to the formed corners I think. 2 mil (.002") thinner than some other brands but that is about half the thickness of a normal human hair so I doubt we will notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: We've had a waterbed for years so when our other ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had a waterbed for years so when our other one sprung a leak we didn't think we could find another one. Thank s to InnoMax Corp. we are sleeping on water again. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Very easy to install and made out of good heavy duty vinyl. Great reinforced corners. The only thing is that the matrass is not opaque enough to really see the air bubbles. My old one was clear plastic so they were easier to see. Other than that I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Johns on.

customer_reviews.title: ... waterbed for 26 years and This mattress is the best mattress I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have had my waterbed for 26 years and This mattress is the best mattress I have ever had. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pellegrin

product_meta.title: INNOMAX Sanctuary Free Flow Full Wave Waterbed Mattress, King
product_meta.description: The InnoMax Sanctuary Free Flow Waterbed Mattress offers Full Wave motion to provide custom tailored Hydrodynamic Sleep resulting in virtually perfect ear to ankle body alignment as defined by physicians and chiropractors for the ideal sleeping posture. This deep fill InnoMax waterbed mattress, for use with minimum 9x72x84" rigid box or wood waterbed frames, performs best when filled properly and fill level is below the top of the Safety Liner. The Sanctuary Free Flow Waterbed Mattress, which provides true InnoMax SG1 Full Depth Flotation and Full Motion Performance. Other features include; Premium Vinyl, Contouring Body Profile Low Tension Sleep Surface, Double Reinforced Corners and T-Corner Lap Seam Construction. The SG1 (Specific Gravity 1) Low Tension Mattress (LTM) surface features responsive levels of support for your body's varied levels of need; for the head, mid-body spinal and leg areas. For near perfect body alignment, the responsive give of the generously overcut SG1 surface cradles your body while the interior elements provide complementary support. Additionally, the SG1 LTM surface eliminates disruption of the other sleeper when one gets out of bed and with varying weights of sleep partners. NASA astronaut training is often done under water as it simulates the effects of being weightless because the human body, comprised of 90-percent water, is in balance with the fluid environment. Just as babies are suspended in a gravity neutral fluid environment until born, InnoMax SG1 Hydrodynamic Sleep mattresses truly offer flotation support as nature prescribes. The body can only be truly relaxed when muscles do not have to constantly fight the forces of gravity. SG1 fluid suspension evenly supports your body in gravity neutral sleep and offer hygienic environment as they are easily cleaned with approved Waterbed Vinyl Conditioner.
feature_bullets: Sanctuary Free Flow Deep Fill Waterbed Mattress for full depth rigid side box frame Full Wave Performance and 20 year warranty
No Wave Reduction and weightless feel featuring Full Motion Performance and gravity neutral fluid suspension mid-body support
Zero wave elimination system and 20 mil premium vinyl Body Profile sleep surface generously overcut Low Tension Mattress design
Double Reinforced Corners and T-Corner Lap Seam Construction
Use with approved Waterbed Heater Waterbed Safety Liner Waterbed Water and Vinyl Conditioner Do Not Fill above Safety Liner
